tracking.googleAnalytcis4.propertyID.title: Google Analytics 4 tracking ID
tracking.googleAnalytcis4.propertyID.description: Enter the Google Analytics 4 Tracking ID. SuiteCommerce Advanced inserts this property into each page of the application. To locate the tracking ID, login to your Google Analytics account and go to Admin > Property > Property Settings.

tracking.googleAnalytcis4.domainName.title: Google Analytics 4 domain
tracking.googleAnalytcis4.domainName.description: Enter the domain used for Google Universal Analytics. The value you enter depends on which application you want to use Google Universal Analytics

tracking.googleAnalytcis4.domainNameSecu.title: Google Analytics 4 secure domain
tracking.googleAnalytcis4.domainNameSecu.description: Enter the secure domain used for Google Universal Analytics. Possible values are the same as the Universal Analytics Domain property.
